alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 7:41PM EST until March 03 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EST FOR EASTERN MEIGS...SOUTHEASTERN ATHENS AND MASON COUNTIES... At 738 PM EST, a line of severe thunderstorms extending from Amesville to near Racine to near Leon, is moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Pomeroy, Racine, New Haven, Mason, Middleport, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Henderson, Leon, Amesville, Lakin, Stroud Run State Park, Southside, Darwin and Letart. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
